name: Miasma - Game Jam Game
description:
Recover, Recall and Reawaken.

Miasma is a story driven game where the player must piece together fragments of their memory while in a coma.

Programming:   Jack Thomson, Harvey Stanyer, Kirsty Taylor

Environment Build:  Sarah Hellawell, Jack Marston

Asset Texture/Colour (Material ID's):   Sarah Hellawell

2D Art, Animation, Programming (Post-processing, bug fixes):   Kirsty Taylor

Asset Creation:   Joshua Sanderson, Alexander Braekevelt, Jack Marston & Hellawell

Audio SFX, Voice Actor, UI Art:   Connor  Treherne
